channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘She did not even attend his funeral’: My friend married in secret and suddenly died. Does his widow inherit his $1 million home?
item.description: “His parents paid for the $50,000 down payment to the house when they purchased it 30 years ago.”

item.title: Stocks Look to Extend Record Run Ahead of Tech Earnings, Election
item.description: Investors are bracing for updates from five big tech companies and upheaval around the election.

item.title: Churches Look Skyward for Energy Savings
item.description: Big federal subsidies are driving a surge in solar installations on church rooftops.

item.title: ‘Some airline passengers are gross’: I don’t understand why they cheat to board early. Why do they act like savages?
item.description: American Airlines is targeting “gate lice” with technology that sets off an alarm when a passenger tries to skip their group number.

item.title: ‘Their house was purchased with my family money’: My late father left a life estate to his second wife. She’s only 10 years older than me. How can I undo this?
item.description: “Apparently the probate laws in Florida are different, perhaps superseding the will.”

item.title: Legendary ‘Letterman’ and ‘Daily Show’ producer on discovering hidden talent on the job — and in herself — at 65
item.description: Madeleine Smithberg is used to identifying talent, but now the tables are turning.

item.title: Heard on the Street's Stock-Picking Series
item.description: Check out the stocks Heard on the Street writers favor in their eighth annual stock-picking contest.

item.title: Pfizer's Activist Battle Might Fizzle---but Its Stock Probably Won't
item.description: The pharmaceutical company’s stock is relatively cheap, representing an opportunity for patient value investors.

item.title: The Score: McDonald's, Tesla, Spirit Airlines and More Stocks That Defined the Week
item.description: Here are some of the major companies whose stocks moved on the week’s news.

item.title: ‘I worry I’ll be forced to sell the house’: My parents put their house in my name. Was this a terrible mistake?
item.description: “When my mother passes away, what will the tax implications be?”
